title: Justin Bieber Boosts Tim Hortons Sales, CEO Calls Himself a ‘Belieber’
sub_head: Singer’s collaboration on bite-sized doughnuts brought in younger customers, company says
body:
A line of bite-sized doughnuts named after Justin Bieber boosted sales at Tim Hortons, prompting the chief executive to declare himself a superfan of the music star.
“I’m a Belieber,” José Cil said during a call with Wall Street analysts Tuesday, using a word Mr. Bieber’s biggest fans call themselves. Mr. Cil is the CEO of Tim Hortons’ parent company Restaurant Brands International Inc . , which also owns Burger King and Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen.
